item.title: That place is a frick'ng CULT
item.description:
They continuosly FAIL to manipulate me

why i dont interact with my colleagues and teachers? cuz i think that is going to be fking waste of time for me. I dont wanna say it but my clg (and others) + the Education System has become a CULT. Plus there is also a few students who just always wants to dominate each and every environment. Anything goes slightly against their plans and they will start a drama (to catch attention). In my first yrs I didnt understand wtf is wrong. Cuz I didnt know back then that this kinda shitty syndrome was a thing. Funny thing is infact a guy in my class had multiple face off with that dude. He literally dropped out in 3rd sem just becuz he couldnt bear with that kinda shit (Although he himself was kinda partially responsible in that scenario. Moreover he was also financially independent through his online business (seemingly..)). Before getting admission to any clg or university I have gone through tones of vdos-blogs-discussion_forums(all affiliated to Indian Edu system) and also Quora('..Im really sorry for my past self but hey, u learn from ur mistakes:) '). What I got from all these is no matter how worse ur clg is, u will meet people who will be contrary to the main stream. For example, creating helpful and interesting Repositories, understanding the concepts and algorithms of COmpetitive Programming and its implication in real life problem solving, getting our hands dirty in open-source projects. I had read about such stories alot. But ohh my poor soul... \'Always expect the unexpected\'. Now Im in 4th semester and what I understand is all they want is their teachers(75% of whom r shitty in their own way. Most of these people are only 2-3 yrs older than us) and peers' attention, getting laid(i.e. the guys) and getting into a relationship(i.e. the girls), maintaining their domination etc. These seems to be more worser than typical Engineering Clg bulling (jking :), that kinda bully is very rare nowadays). After completing BTech, they all r planning to give the GATE(for which they have absolute 0 passion) and enroll in MTech course(or prepare of Govt jobs( sighh.. thats a whole another story) and from there to MBA/PHD (as long as their \"frnds\" doing the same) and then marriage(4 girls who failed to land a job; 4 boys, its going to be pretty difficult )). Most of such people will then end up as a teacher in a Pvt Clg or University(like my current teachers ). As long as u r a member of this cycle, society(fsociety btw) will consider u as Normal, Future of the Nation, Educated and A worthy Human Being for producing child (not jking). But if u r someone who is outta this cycle, in the eyes of society(fsociety again btw) u became, WOrthless, An uneducated filthy soul, A waste of Oxygen, Introverted piece of sh't and thus u slowly start get isolated(99.99% of these victims r males). As Gen. Shepherd said, "Boundaries shift, new players step in; but power always finds a place to rest its head". They are just so much indulged into fake frienship that it gives me a kind of anxiety(btw this isnt like Social Anxiety; its like ur r naked & unarmed amid a bunch of psycopathic thugs with AR, Glock and knife). From my past experience from my High School I think faking friendship with them is valueless for my life. Main reasons for me to choose that clg is , 1. Fees Structure, 2. Ease of travel, 3. Less amount of mandatory strict rules compared to other clgs. So yeah, 4 and a half semesters to go and Im getting outta this CULT.
